MSG.ShortText: A backup should be created with an illegal id=$JOB_ID$.
MSG.Description: An internal error occurred. The backup structures must be aligned with the available backup server tasks; this is no longer the case here. The Id=$JOB_ID$ is either smaller than 1 or larger than the sum of MAXBACKUPDEVS and MaxDateVolumes.

MSG.ShortText: Only a mediano=$MEDIA_NO$ or a volumeno=$VOLUME_NO$ can be given.
MSG.Description: A programming error occurred. The interface may only be used for volumes or for media at one time.

MSG.ShortText: No heap memory is availble for $DESCRIPTION$.
MSG.Description: A memory allocation returned the value 0. Therefore no more heap memory is available.

MSG.ShortText: Allocation of recovery component is not complete.
There are no more jobs in the job list.
